main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Fairborn, Ohio on 4 June 1967, lasting for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting involved a single unidentified object moving rapidly and appearing brighter than normal,The object seemed to emit smaller lights and moved vertically,The observation was conducted from the ground,The object traveled in an east-west course,The observation report concluded that there was insufficient data for scientific evaluation.
